{"Header 1": "Upload Component", "Header 2": "FAQ", "Header 3": "How to use `customRequest`?"}

See: https://github.com/react-component/upload#customrequest

{"Header 1": "Form", "Header 2": "Interfaces", "Header 3": "GetFieldsValue"}

Overloads:  
- `getFieldsValue(nameList?: true | NamePath[], filterFunc?)`
- Empty: All registered fields.
- `true`: All stored values (including unregistered).
- Array: Specific paths (e.g., `[['user', 'age']]`).  
- `getFieldsValue({ filter?: FilterFunc })`  
---

{"Header 1": "FAQ", "Header 2": "How to avoid breaking changes when updating?"}

`antd` avoids breaking changes in minor/patch versions. Safe practices:  
- Use official demos and FAQ suggestions.
- Avoid treating bugs as features.
- Avoid “magic code” — prefer standard APIs.  
---

{"Header 1": "Upload Component", "Header 2": "FAQ", "Header 3": "How to use `customRequest`?"}

See: https://github.com/react-component/upload#customrequest

{"Header 1": "Upload Component", "Header 2": "Interfaces", "Header 3": "RequestOptions"}

Used in `customRequest`.  
| Property | Description | Type | Default |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `action` | Upload URL | `string` | - |
| `data` | Extra params | `Record<string, unknown>` | - |
| `filename` | File name | `string` | - |
| `file` | UploadFile object | `UploadFile` | - |
| `withCredentials` | Send cookies | `boolean` | - |
| `headers` | Request headers | `Record<string, string>` | - |
| `method` | HTTP method | `string` | - |
| `onProgress` | Progress callback | `(event, file) => void` | - |
| `onError` | Error callback | `(event, body?) => void` | - |
| `onSuccess` | Success callback | `(body, fileOrXhr?) => void` | - |  
---

{"Header 1": "FAQ", "Header 2": "How to avoid breaking changes when updating?"}

`antd` avoids breaking changes in minor/patch versions. Safe practices:  
- Use official demos and FAQ suggestions.
- Avoid treating bugs as features.
- Avoid “magic code” — prefer standard APIs.

{"Header 1": "FAQ", "Header 2": "Why does `antd` override my global styles?"}

Yes — `antd` overrides global styles for convenience in building admin apps. These cannot be removed. See [GitHub #4331](https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues/4331).  
Alternative: [Avoid Modifying Global Styles](/docs/react/customize-theme#how-to-avoid-modifying-global-styles)  
---

{"Header 1": "FAQ", "Header 2": "How to disable motion?"}

```jsx
<ConfigProvider theme={{ token: { motion: false } }}>
<App />
</ConfigProvider>
```  
---
